New Records: Francisco Lindor hit a grand slam in the sixth inning
Key Match Events: Francisco Lindor's grand slam sends Mets into NLCS with 4-1 win over Phillies in Game 4 of NLDS
Miscellaneous Highlights: Umpires: James Hoye, Carlos Torres, Andy Fletcher, John Tumpane, Edwin Moscoso, Doug Eddings
Others: The game was played at Citi Field in Queens, New York
The Mets will move on to the NLCS
